item.title: Welcome
item.description: Xem bản tiếng Việt dưới bản tiếng Anh này Welcome! It has been a while since the last time I built the first blocks of code for my blog website. But eh, the codebase was truly a mess (thanks to Hexo, bye!). So I’m gonna write (a lot of) things everyday, mostly about my self-study progress (about English, mathematics and computer) and my daily thoughts. It could be notes, sometimes.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me…? There is no Vietnamese version of this page. Trang này sẽ không có phiên bản tiếng Việt. Hi, I’m Wello! A student, who is irresistible to find out how computer beep-booping. Some words about myself Well, there’s nothing much to talk about myself, though. I’m a half-weeb, because I sometimes watch anime, just for fun. I’m a both Windows and Linux user. Linux is always the best operating system that I loves the most, but it’s still somehow not very good for the desktop, where Windows is doing pretty fine.
